items.sentence: The pain you go through because of love is by far sweeter than any other pleasure.
If you don't think that the party is going to be any fun, then I don't want to go.
If you keep fish in a fish bowl, you should change the water at least once a week.
I was planning to drop by Tom's on the way home and ask him if he needed any help.
In order to get to know a person, one merely needs to travel with them for a week.
